dct_title_s: Nieuween nette zeekart van de geheele Waareld
dct_description_sm: California shown as a labeled island with an indented northern coast and some placenames.
Great lakes are not shown. Includes a partial outline of Australia.
Map of the world showing magnetic declination for 1700 and direction of monsoon winds.
"O Lindeman in Almelo fecit 1775." at bottom left.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
